name: Slippery World
description:
Welcome to Slippery World, a fun game you can play with a friend.

[ Made For Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2]

The aim of the game is to get the puck to your own base. Use WASD to control Red and Arrow keys to control Blue. Don't mThe aim of the game is to get the puck to your own base. Use WASD to control Red and Arrow keys to control Blue. Don't mind the AI players, their job is to distract you.ind the AI players, their job is to distract you.

The first one to get a score of five wins

Music :- William Tell - Overture (Gioachino Rossini Remix) William Tell Overture hard remix beat type - Gioachino Rossini
